content: marled beanie materials 1 skein valhalla yarns marled 2oz/175 yds 16 circular needles in sizes us 3 & 6 3 25mm & 4mm size 6 double-pointed needles or another size that s close stitch marker yarn needle suggested eucalan wool wash for blocking gauge 24 sts = 4 in stockinette st before blocking finished circumference approx 19 instructions using size 3 circulars cast on 108 sts join being careful not to twist stitches knit in k1 p1 ribbing for about 1 5 change to size 6 circulars place a marker at beginning of next round and work in stockinette with garter rib as follows o round 1 k6 p3 repeat around o round 2 knit all stitches around repeat rounds 1 & 2 until hat measures 7 5 from cast on edge ending with a round 2 or about ½ less than you want the finished height to be shape crown as follows change to double-pointed needles when it becomes too difficult to continue knitting with the circulars round 1 k2tog k2 ssk p3 repeat around round 2 knit all sts around round 3 k6 p1 repeat around round 4 k2tog k2 ssk k1 repeat around round 5 k4 p1 repeat around round 6 knit all sts around round 7 k2tog ssk p1 repeat around round 8 knit all sts around round 9 k2tog p1 repeat around round 10 k2tog repeat around cut yarn tail about 8 inches and thread into yarn needle and take remaining stitches off the double points pulling the tail through the stitches cinch up being very careful not to break the yarn ask me how i know weave tail on the inside until secure glossary k = knit | p = purl | sts = stitches | round = round | k2tog = knit 2 sts together ssk = slip 2 sts knit-wise one at a time onto your right needle insert left needle through the front of those sts and knit them together ©copyright 2025 fengari 415 main st half moon bay ca 94019 650 726-2550 www fengari net all rights reserved
